pr_title: [GEOT-3377] Charset not used for DBF header

timeline.message: [GEOT-3377] Charset not used for DBF header

timeline.bodyText:
A public method in a public class cannot be removed just like this I'm afraid, we try to maintain backwards compatibility as much as possible, document changes when not. Two options:

Add the method back
Warn users upgrading of the API break in the upgrade guide

Both are acceptable to me.
timeline.author: aaime

replies.bodyText: The charset is now a class field. I believe that keeping the method with same parameter will be confusing. Going to stick with second option.
replies.author: dvfed
